title: A decorative font, italic and sans serifs. Nice rounded shapes.
author: willythekidkompis

comments.content:
Firstly thought it could have been harder, a big customization of some obscure techy freebie but I found [Miniskip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052711/http:/www.dafont.com/miniskip.font). Just need to start with Miniskap (middle weight of Miniskip), tweak it a bit (/E crossbar terminal, /i dot) and job should be done.  
Alternative: [Aura T-26](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052711/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/aura)
